title: [Feywrot Mire, Trail of Hexes]
description: A few brightly painted structures, some raised above the moist soil, beckon visitors with signage on the upslope of the path.  To the downslope side, the knobby knees of a grouping of pond cypress have effectively thwarted the plans of any builders to locate here.

A few brightly painted structures, some raised above the moist soil, beckon visitors with signage on the upslope of the walkway.  To the downslope side, the knobby knees of a grouping of pond cypress have effectively thwarted the plans of any builders to locate here.
